Comments_List: It gave me a better understanding of the way that society and culture and the stuff that makes us people informs the economics of what we do, which feels very valuable as someone studying economics which is a largely impersonal field.
I think there was difficulty in getting class participation sometimes.
Yes, I thought this was a great course. I looked forward to the reading every week and I think Professor Luo was great.
